title: Google assistant disables Bluetooth functions
content:
A few weeks back I started having a problem with music and Google assistant. Whenever I ask Google to play a song, the Bluetooth functions of the device in connected to no longer respond.

To give an example:
I'm in my car, I open Spotify and play a song manually - no issues everything's fine.
Then I'll use the voice control button on the car (or I'll say "hey Google") to activate Google assistant and give a voice command "play X on Spotify"
Assistant will play the song but now I can no longer skip or pause tracks. This problem persists until I restart Spotify.
The same issue happens when connected to a bluetooth speaker

I've already contacted Spotify and tried everything such as clean reinstall, changing permissions and changing settings to absolutely no joy.
I tried using SIRI on an iPhone and it worked perfectly so have narrowed it down to an assistant problem.

Any advice?
Thanks in advance
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4
